articles.title: Probiotics vs Cognitive Decline: Gut Health Key to Aging Brain Fitness - Neuroscience News
articles.description: The study suggests that altering gut microbiome might be a strategic approach to enhancing cognitive function in individuals with mild cognitive impairment.
articles.content: Summary: Probiotics might play a vital role in preventing cognitive decline associated with aging. By providing participants suffering from mild cognitive impairment with the probiotic Lactobacillus … [+5106 chars]

articles.title: Long COVID impact on brain function equivalent to ageing 10 years - Euronews
articles.description: A UK study found that the impact of long COVID on people’s cognitive functions was equal to ageing them 10 years.
articles.content:
A UK study found that the impact of long COVID on peoples cognitive functions was equal to ageing them 10 years.
